message.entry: {0,number,integer}-D data not supported for RAS files
RAS bitmap files not supported with either colormaps or alpha channels.
Bitmap image matrix can not be 3-D with RAS files.
Alpha channel not supported with indexed RAS files.
Index matrix can not be 3-D with RAS files.
Colormaps with more than 256 colors are not supported with RAS files.
Some colormap values are > 1, so clipping colormap.
Some colormap values are < 0, so clipping colormap.
Index matrix of class double or single must have positive values.
Index values too large for colormap.
Data with {0,number,integer} components not supported for RAS files
RAS images does not allow 16 bits per component. Reducing to 8 bits per component.
Alpha channel not supported with grayscale RAS files.
Height and width of alpha data must match that of image data.
RLE not supported with {0,number,integer} bit RAS files. Writing standard RAS file.
